thread.title: Cheryl and Liam Payne won't share any more baby photos as they want son kept out of spotlight
thread.title_full: Cheryl and Liam Payne won't share any more baby photos as they want son kept out of spotlight

author: Lara Martin
title: Cheryl and Liam Payne won't share any more baby photos as they want son kept out of spotlight
text:
Cheryl and Liam Payne won't share any more baby photos as they want son kept out of spotlight Mirror Celebs understands the famously private couple want their child to grow up out of the spotlight Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Proud new parents Cheryl and Liam Payne will not share any more photos of their baby son. 
Mirror Celebs understands the couple want to keep their child out of the spotlight, which means not posting photos of him to social media, posing for magazine photoshoots or exposing him to the limelight in any way. 
Girls Aloud star Cheryl, 33, and One Direction singer boyfriend Liam, 23, announced the arrival of their first child via simultaneous Instagram posts on Saturday night. 
Both posts featured the same picture of Liam lovingly cradling the tiny newborn, with the little boyâ€™s face turned away from the camera as he snuggles into besotted dad Liam's chest. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Cheryl shows off HUGE baby bump in photoshoot video Share this video Watch Next 
It was an intimate and rare glimpse into Cheryl and Liam's happy new life as a family of three, and for fans, it's all they are going to get when it comes to photos. 
An insider tells Mirror Celebs the couple won't share any further baby pictures with fans as they want their as-yet-unnamed child to have a life away from the limelight. 
"They've always been a very private couple," says a source. "And they want their son to remain private as well. They don't want him to be in the spotlight at all. 
"They want him to grow up away from the cameras." 
It won't be a surprise for fans as Cheryl and Liam have always kept their relationship private; they've rarely appeared on the red carpet together and it was only this month Liam actually spoke publicly about Cheryl for the first time. 
They never even confirmed their pregnancy until February, when Cheryl posed with her baby bump for a L'Oreal and Prince's Trust campaign. 
And fans have applauded them for doing so. 
One tweeted last night: "Liam and Cheryl handled their pregnancy so well. They kept it so private. I'm so glad. It's [something] only them and their families should be part of." 
Another said: "During the whole pregnancy Liam and Cheryl have kept everything so private and to themselves and their families. That's the cutest thing." 
And a third said: "I genuinely appreciate how private Cheryl and Liam have kept the pregnancy." 
Former X Factor judge Cheryl and popstar beau Liam welcomed their son on Wednesday, but only made the happy news public on Saturday. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
